snippet.title: The Door - Teaser. An original story and puzzle game, set in a beautiful world which holds a secret.
snippet.description:
Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1360440/The_Door/
☝🏽☝🏽☝🏽
THE DOOR is a unique story-puzzle with teleportation! Travel through stunning landscapes with your confused robot friend, Cell44, and help her escape the Big Thing in the Sky. 

Planned launch launch in 2021 - PC/Mac, mobile and consoles in 2021. Looking for publishing/Invest.

STORY 
Upon discovering and going through a secret digital door, you find yourself trapped in an alternate world together with a slightly needy and flying robot. Guided by the robot, you must find your way home through a series of doors and puzzles leading to the legendary exit in the sky. 
But, something is amiss: The omnipresent structure floating in the sky seems aware of your presence. What is it's intention, what is it doing here? And where is the way out from here?

If you like atmospheric walking simulators with story, puzzles and more than one twist - THE DOOR is Likely a game for you. 

Looking for publishing and investment for development. Planned release 2021.
Demo and pitch deck available on request.
Supported by the Danish Film Institute.
